title: Icon
body: When Snow Down (christmas for league) was on, it said if l were to gift something to a friend, l would receive a crab with coffee... I still have not. So when am l going to receive it?

replies.body: With Snowdown having only recently been completed, the icon distribution process also hasn't been going on for that long. As such, give it up to two weeks for the icon to complete distribution, and if you still don't have the icon by then, please let me know or submit a ticket.
Same here. Gifted 2 people just to make sure i did it correctly after the first time and still no icon.
